structure.unit: COUNTY AND CITY BRIDGES, TUNNELS, AND FERRIES

law.catch_line: Obligations of city in regard to the bridge.
law.text: In the contract the city may agree to transfer and assign to the person contracting with it, any interest or right the city has in the bridge or portion, or any interest or right of the city to acquire the bridge or portion, and shall agree to take over the bridge when turned over to it as provided in KRS 181.510, and thereafter to maintain and operate it as a free bridge until it is taken over and maintained and operated by the state or an agency of the state.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3235g-3.
